mapper.select:
select flw.id, flw.house_id as houseId, flw.create_time as createTime,
hse.name, hse.build_area as buildArea, hse.total_price as totalPrice, hse.house_type_id as houseTypeId, hse.floor_id as floorId, hse.direction_id as directionId, hse.default_image_url as defaultImageUrl,
cmty.name as communityName from user_follow flw left join hse_house hse on hse.id = flw.house_id left join hse_community cmty on cmty.id = hse.community_id
user_id = #{userId} and flw.is_deleted = 0 and hse.is_deleted = 0 and cmty.is_deleted = 0
order by flw.id desc
